base_description: Rectangular window with blue and gray panes.
part_description: Two glass panes, one blue and one gray, in a white rectangular frame. The blue pane is positioned above the gray pane.
internal_interaction_description: The window consists of two panes held within a single frame. The frame supports and separates the panes, allowing them to be fixed in place. The upper blue pane and lower gray pane are adjacent, providing a dual-pane structure for insulation and light control.
external_interaction_description: The window can be installed in a wall, allowing light to enter a room while providing a view outside. It can be opened or closed to regulate airflow and temperature. The different colors of the panes may affect the light quality entering the space.
